title: MAGIX Music Maker 2016 Live [Download]
features: Perform music live: Use your keyboard, app or MIDI controller to play 16 virtual pads with loop functionality for producing electronic beats on stage or on your PC.
MAGIX Audio Remote: The free app for playing virtual instruments over WiFi
Drag & drop the beat: Combine professionally-produced sounds, loops and vocals from a range of popular music genres.
Professionally produced sounds from the genres Hip Hop, 80s, Techno, Rock Pop, Chillout, Deep House
Internet connection: Required for registering and validating the program, as well as for some program features.
description: The fastest way to get started performing live:

Live lets you produce and improvise your own professional beats and songs in no time at all, even if you don't have any previous experience. 16 virtual pads with loop functionality and editable sets for Hip Hop, Trap und Techno take your music to a whole new level. The new dream team: Play the virtual instruments in Music Maker with your smartphone or tablet over WiFi using the free

app. Drag & drop the beat: Combine premade sounds, loops or vocals from a range of popular music genres with your own recordings to create completely new songs or perform live in front of an audience with your loops sets.
